Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj2.tracker.Receiver

  • Packages that use Receiver 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2.tracker
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tracker contains classes for the Parallel Java 2 (PJ2) Tracker and related classes.

    • Uses of Receiver in edu.rit.pj2.tracker

      Subclasses of Receiver in edu.rit.pj2.tracker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackendReceiver
      Class BackendReceiver provides a thread that receives messages from a Backend.
      class  JobReceiver
      Class JobReceiver provides a thread that receives messages from a Job.
      class  LauncherReceiver
      Class LauncherReceiver provides a thread that receives messages from a Launcher.
      class  TrackerReceiver
      Class TrackerReceiver provides a thread that receives messages from a Tracker.
      Methods in edu.rit.pj2.tracker with parameters of type Receiver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ReceiverListener.receiverFailed(Receiver receiver, Throwable exc)
      Report that the given receiver failed.
      Constructors in edu.rit.pj2.tracker with parameters of type Receiver 
      Constructor and Description
      Proxy(Socket socket, Receiver receiver)
      Construct a new proxy using the given socket; call this constructor to attach a proxy to an incoming connection that was accepted.
      Proxy(Socket socket, Sender sender, Receiver receiver)
      Construct a new proxy using the given socket; call this constructor to attach a proxy to an existing outgoing connection.
      Proxy(String host, int port, Sender sender, Receiver receiver)
      Construct a new proxy and connect it to the given host and port; call this constructor to initiate an outgoing connection and attach a proxy to it.
